alert.note: Alert for Clark; Comanche; Ford; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:53PM CDT until June 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Kiowa County in south central Kansas... Comanche County in south central Kansas... Eastern Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ford to 11 miles north of Buffalo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bucklin around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Mullinville, Buttermilk and Greensburg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
